items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: A button component with multiple variants and sizes.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A tooltip component for displaying contextual information.

items.name: token
items.title: Token
items.description: A tooltip-based component for documenting design tokens.

items.name: token-indicator
items.title: TokenIndicator
items.description: A small indicator that reads token context, supports custom shapes and children.

items.name: icon-token
items.title: BaseIconToken
items.description: A base token variant that renders an icon next to the token name; use it to build custom icon tokens.

items.name: color-token
items.title: ColorToken
items.description: A specialized component for documenting color tokens.

items.name: elevation-token
items.title: ElevationToken
items.description: A token variant with a layers icon for elevation and shadow values.

items.name: duration-token
items.title: DurationToken
items.description: A token variant with a timer icon for animation or transition durations.

items.name: spacing-token
items.title: SpacingToken
items.description: A token variant with a ruler icon for spacing, padding, and gap values.

items.name: typography-token
items.title: TypographyToken
items.description: A token variant with a typography icon for font, size, and line-height values.

items.name: order-token
items.title: OrderToken
items.description: A token variant with a layers-2 icon for z-index and stacking contexts.

items.name: radius-token
items.title: RadiusToken
items.description: A token variant with a spline icon for border radius values.

items.name: font-family-token
items.title: FontFamilyToken
items.description: A token variant with a type icon for font family values.

items.name: font-weight-token
items.title: FontWeightToken
items.description: A token variant with a weight icon for font weight values.

items.name: number-token
items.title: NumberToken
items.description: A token variant with a hash icon for numeric values like line-height.

items.name: color-ramp
items.title: ColorRamp
items.description: A component for displaying labeled color scales for palettes and token ramps
